meta.title: AquaPump — Israeli Water Innovation
meta.description: AquaPump is an Israeli Aquatech Group company delivering premium pumps, digital twins, and telemetry-ready infrastructure for municipalities, industry, and agriculture.

hero.title: Future-proof water infrastructure.
hero.subtitle: AquaPump is an Israeli company within the Aquatech Group crafting premium pump systems with Apple-level finish, Tesla-grade analytics, and deployment-ready Supabase integrations.
features: Israeli engineering backed by Aquatech Group
Supabase-ready event streaming for instant alerts
Digital twins and predictive maintenance dashboards
hero.panel_body: Since 1991, Israeli-crafted systems powering municipalities, industry, and agri-tech worldwide.
hero.panel_meta: Member of Aquatech Group · ISO 9001 · GreenMark

brands.copy: Global infrastructure leaders lean on AquaPump aesthetics and reliability for mission critical distribution.

sections.expertise_lead: Precision engineering, digital monitoring, and lifecycle support to keep critical systems running.

cards.title: Municipal & Infra
cards.desc: Large-scale pumping stations, wastewater, pressure boosting & telemetry.

cards.title: Industrial
cards.desc: Process pumps, VFD optimization, energy audits & turnkey retrofits.

cards.title: Agriculture
cards.desc: Irrigation systems, fertigation, and high-efficiency multi-stage pumps.

impact.title: Speed, stability, and savings
impact.lead: Optimized UI and UX deliver quicker decisions, while our Israeli-built hardware cuts commissioning time and energy consumption across every deployment.
bullets: Responsive across mobile, tablet, and command centers
Edge and cloud telemetry tuned for sub-second refresh
SEO-first architecture to help prospects find AquaPump

metrics.title: ↓ 42% faster launch
metrics.body: Optimized assets, caching, and structured data for best-in-class speed scores.

metrics.title: Global uptime mesh
metrics.body: Redundant Israeli-built panels with Aquatech Group field teams on call 24/7.

metrics.title: SEO-ready structure
metrics.body: Semantic markup, JSON-LD, and keyword-rich copy capture every lead.

sustainability.title: Smarter Energy, Smaller Footprint
sustainability.lead: Our pumps are designed to reduce energy consumption by up to 30%, integrating smart controls and remote diagnostics to minimize downtime and environmental impact.
sustainability.caption: Average efficiency gains vs. legacy systems

aquatech.title: Part of Israel's Aquatech Group
aquatech.lead: As a proud member of the Aquatech Group, AquaPump delivers integrated solutions backed by nationwide service teams and decades of Israeli water innovation.
bullets: National coverage with Aquatech service hubs
Shared R&D fueling next-gen pump intelligence
Seamless hand-off from design to installation

products.title: Signature systems by AquaPump
products.lead: Israeli-engineered pumps from the Aquatech Group network with telemetry-ready controls, premium finishes, and container-ready deployment patterns.

items.title: Smart Pump SAJ
items.desc: High-efficiency pump for municipal and industrial use.

items.title: Wastewater Pro
items.desc: Robust solids-handling pump for infrastructure projects.

cta.title: Connect the field to your command center
cta.lead: Our control suite ships ready to plug into Supabase, Azure, or AWS so your telemetry, customer portal, and billing flows are a configuration away.
cta.caption: Add credentials, containerize, deploy. That’s it.

performance.title: Built for global scale
performance.lead: Hardware, firmware, and UI designed together to keep flow, uptime, and insights synchronized across every site.
bullets: Edge-accelerated data collection with Israeli-grade security
Modular skid architecture for fast deployment
Fully documented REST and webhook interfaces

metrics.title: Container ready
metrics.body: Drop in your API keys, build the Docker image, and run with observability baked in.

metrics.title: Global compliance
metrics.body: Meets Israeli, EU, and US drinking water, wastewater, and industrial standards.

metrics.title: Service anywhere
metrics.body: Aquatech Group partners keep Israeli expertise within reach worldwide.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.lead: Connect with AquaPump’s Israeli engineering team. As part of the Aquatech Group we respond in minutes and stay with you through deployment.

errors.name: Please enter your full name.
errors.phone: Add the best number to reach you.
errors.message: Share a few details so we can help.

validation.phone: Please provide a valid phone number.

details.title: Talk with our engineers
details.lead: We respond in under 15 minutes on business days. Share your scope and we will prepare deployment-ready recommendations.
details.meta: Looking for API access? Add your keys to the .env file and go live.

extra.title: Aquatech Group coverage
extra.lead: From Tel Aviv headquarters to regional service hubs, we bring Israeli innovation and Aquatech Group resources wherever you operate.

metrics.title: 22 partner sites
metrics.body: Shared parts inventory and 24/7 call centers keep deployments resilient.

metrics.title: Dedicated launch team
metrics.body: We guide you from API key setup to full containerized rollouts.

metrics.title: Global support SLA
metrics.body: Israeli engineers coordinate with Aquatech partners for seamless maintenance.

chat.title: AquaBot
chat.subtitle: How can we help?
chat.intro: Hi! I’m AquaBot. Ask me about products, quotes, or support.

placeholder_reply.ready: Connecting you with AquaBot… (integration coming soon).
placeholder_reply.fallback: Thanks! A specialist will reach out shortly.

chat.contact_confirmation: Thanks for reaching out! We will contact you shortly.
